mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NO AS replyNo, POST_NO AS postNo, REPLY_CONTENT AS replyContent, REPLY_WRITER AS replyWriter, REG_DATE AS regDate, UPT_DATE AS uptDate FROM TB_BOARD_REPLY WHERE POST_NO = ${postNo} ORDER BY REPLY_NO ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT TB_BOARD_REPLY( REPLY_NO, POST_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_WRITER, REG_DATE, UPT_DATE )VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(REPLY_NO),0)+1 FROM TB_BOARD_REPLY), ${postNo}, #{replyContent}, #{replyWriter}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD_REPLY SET REPLY_CONTENT = #{replyContent}, UPT_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE REPLY_NO = ${replyNo}
